attributes.action: We the British people want Boris Johnson immediately removed from office
attributes.additional_details: The job he has performed and misleading the house and the people
attributes.background: We want parliament to trigger a vote of no confidence against the prime minister

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require a Prime Minister be removed from office if found to have broken the law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614729
